New Records: Jazz Chisholm Jr became the second player since 1900 to both hit a grand slam and steal three bases in a single game
Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm Jr hit a go-ahead grand slam in the bottom of the 8th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the first NL East win for the Marlins against the division champions
Others: Josh Bell drew a two-out walk before Jazz Chisholm Jr's grand slam, and Jake Burger also hit a two-run homer for the Marlins
